comment.author: 78454400@N00
comment._content: This is a photo very near and dear to my heart. ONE because i have always had a special interest in the no longer existing Celilo falls. I live right down river from it and would love to have seen them. TWO because i do see a bridge in this photo and am the creator of the Bridges of the Pacific NW group. I would love to have this added to the group. thank you.. Bridges of the Pacific NW
